TITLE: Portal Launch
DESCRIPTION: Welcome to the new Visakh Refinery Portal! This platform will serve as your central hub for all refinery-related information and services.

TITLE: System Maintenance Schedule
DESCRIPTION: Scheduled maintenance will be performed on the first Sunday of every month from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM. Please plan accordingly.

TITLE: New Safety Protocols
DESCRIPTION: Updated safety protocols are now available in the documents section. All personnel are required to review and acknowledge the new guidelines.

TITLE: Training Session Registration
DESCRIPTION: Registration is now open for the quarterly safety training sessions. Please register through the portal by the end of this month.

TITLE: Holiday Schedule Updated
DESCRIPTION: The holiday schedule for the upcoming year has been updated. Please check the calendar section for details.

TITLE: Emergency Procedures Update
DESCRIPTION: Updated emergency procedures and evacuation plans are now available. All staff must review the new procedures immediately.

TITLE: IT System Upgrade
DESCRIPTION: Our IT systems will be upgraded over the weekend. Some services may be temporarily unavailable on Saturday evening.

TITLE: New Employee Orientation
DESCRIPTION: New employee orientation sessions are scheduled for every Monday. Please check the HR portal for registration details.

TITLE: Environmental Compliance Update
DESCRIPTION: New environmental compliance requirements are in effect. Please review the updated guidelines in the compliance section.

TITLE: Quarterly Performance Review
DESCRIPTION: Quarterly performance review process will begin next week. Managers should prepare evaluation forms and schedule meetings.

TITLE: Equipment Maintenance Notice
DESCRIPTION: Routine maintenance of processing equipment will be conducted during the scheduled shutdown period. All safety protocols must be followed.

TITLE: Benefits Enrollment Open
DESCRIPTION: Annual benefits enrollment is now open. Employees have until the end of the month to make changes to their benefits package.

TITLE: Security Awareness Training
DESCRIPTION: Mandatory security awareness training sessions are scheduled for all employees. Completion is required by month-end.

TITLE: Visitor Policy Update
DESCRIPTION: Updated visitor policy is now in effect. All visitors must be registered in advance and accompanied by an authorized employee.

TITLE: Wellness Program Launch
DESCRIPTION: New employee wellness program includes health screenings, fitness challenges, and mental health resources.
